mapper.select: SELECT TOP 25 A.APP_DATE, A.EMP_NO, B.KOR_NM, B.DEPT_CD, (SELECT SHORT_NM FROM T_SC1010 WHERE DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD) DEPT_NM, B.JIKGUP_CD, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'H' AND LEVEL1_CD = '110' AND LEVEL2_CD = B.JIKGUP_CD) JIKGUP_NM, A.APP_GB, A.APP_GB1, A.APP_DATE1, A.APP_TIME1, A.APP_DATE2, A.APP_TIME2, A.APP_RMK, A.APP_PJT_CD, (SELECT '['+A.APP_PJT_CD+']'+ CASE PJT_CD WHEN '84701' THEN '공통 프로젝트' ELSE PJT_NM END FROM T_SM3000 WHERE PJT_CD = SUBSTRING(A.APP_PJT_CD,1,5)) PJT_NM, A.APP_PLACE, A.APP_BIGO, A.LEAVING_GBN, A.AUDIT_ID, A.APP_DATE1+APP_TIME1+APP_DATE2+APP_TIME2 APP_USE, CASE CONFIRM_YN WHEN '1' THEN '승인' ELSE '대기중' END CONFIRM, CONFIRM_YN, A.CONFIRM_DT, A.RETURN_YN, A.RETURN_TIME, A.PRINT_YN FROM T_PM2200 A, T_HM1000 B WHERE A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO ORDER BY APP_DATE1 DESC, APP_GB

SELECT TOP 10 A.APP_DATE, A.EMP_NO, B.KOR_NM, B.DEPT_CD, (SELECT SHORT_NM FROM T_SC1010 WHERE DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD) DEPT_NM, B.JIKGUP_CD, (SELECT LEVEL2_NM FROM T_SC9100 WHERE BUSI_GB = 'H' AND LEVEL1_CD = '110' AND LEVEL2_CD = B.JIKGUP_CD) JIKGUP_NM, A.APP_GB, A.APP_GB1, A.APP_DATE1, A.APP_TIME1, A.APP_DATE2, A.APP_TIME2, A.APP_RMK, A.APP_PJT_CD, (SELECT '['+A.APP_PJT_CD+']'+ CASE PJT_CD WHEN '84701' THEN '공통 프로젝트' ELSE PJT_NM END FROM T_SM3000 WHERE PJT_CD = SUBSTRING(A.APP_PJT_CD,1,5)) PJT_NM, A.APP_PLACE, A.APP_BIGO, A.LEAVING_GBN, A.AUDIT_ID, A.APP_DATE1+APP_TIME1+APP_DATE2+APP_TIME2 APP_USE, CASE CONFIRM_YN WHEN '1' THEN '승인' ELSE '대기중' END CONFIRM, CONFIRM_YN, A.CONFIRM_DT, A.RETURN_YN, A.RETURN_TIME, A.PRINT_YN FROM T_PM2200 A, T_HM1000 B WHERE A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO AND A.EMP_NO LIKE '%'+#{EMP_NO}+'%' ORDER BY APP_DATE1 DESC, APP_GB
